title: Disputes Operations lead
description: Team lead for the dispute resolution team in charge of driving chargeback, fraud, and merchant engagement operations. Created a team structure that helped with team efficiency and growth. Reduced losses due to chargebacks and fraud by 88% by working with my team to define and reconcile debits passed to Paystack by our partners.

title: Product Specialist (Account management)
description: A pioneer member of the Key accounts team at Paystack; worked with the team to define and identify key merchants and the level of engagement for each Key merchant category. Built and maintained business relationships between Paystack and her top key merchants.

title: Customer Success Expert
description: First customer success member of the Paystack team, which had just started, tasked with turning Paystack's first set of clients into advocates. Created video content on how to sign up on Paystack and wrote helpdesk articles that explained the product features.
